hero.title: The Party Starts Here with
hero.subtitle: Discover our incredible inflatable structures for unforgettable events in Senegal. Perfect for birthdays, fairs, and all your celebrations!

features.title: Why Choose Us?
features.subtitle: We offer more than games, we create memories.
features.quality_text: Safe, clean, and compliant inflatable structures that meet the highest standards.
features.service_text: Our team is dedicated to making your event perfect, from booking to installation.
features.planning_text: Use our AI planner to find the perfect setup for your party in just a few clicks.

featured_inflatables.title: Our Star Structures
featured_inflatables.subtitle: Our customers' favorites for maximum fun.

about_us.title: Who Are We?
about_us.text: GONFL'AFRIK is a company specializing in the rental, sale, and entertainment with inflatable structures. Based in Senegal, our mission is to bring joy, entertainment, and a touch of originality to all types of events: birthdays, weddings, baptisms, fairs, and much more.

ai_planner.title: Plan the Perfect Event with AI
ai_planner.text: Not sure where to start? Our smart assistant recommends the best inflatable structures based on your event type, age group, and available space. Simplify your organization and ensure the success of your party.

gallery_preview.title: Moments of Joy
gallery_preview.subtitle: See happiness in action in our gallery of past events.

CataloguePage.title: Our Dream Catalogue
CataloguePage.subtitle1: Discover our incredible selection of inflatable structures. We have everything you need to make your party unforgettable!
CataloguePage.subtitle2: Birthday, wedding, baptism, fair, gala dinner, school party or corporate event... whatever the occasion, our inflatable structures bring a unique touch of animation, entertainment and elegance. With GONFL‚ÄôAFRIK, every moment becomes unforgettable!

Inflatables.chateau_princesse_desc: A magnificent pink castle for aspiring princesses. Perfect for fairytale birthdays.
Inflatables.parcours_jungle_desc: An exciting jungle-themed obstacle course. For little adventurers.
Inflatables.toboggan_aquatique_desc: A timeless classic! Children and adults alike enjoy the thrill of sliding down the slide to land in a safe area. Ideal for cooling off your events under the sun.
Inflatables.piste_glisse_desc: A long track sprayed with water that allows you to slide at full speed. Perfect for friendly competitions and guaranteed laughs with friends or family.
Inflatables.parc_aquatique_desc: A real floating playground made up of various modules: obstacles, walkways, trampolines and slides. To be installed on a swimming pool or body of water for an unforgettable experience.
Inflatables.combo_aquatique_desc: A versatile structure that combines a play area, slide and water basin. Suitable for children, it brings together fun and freshness in one space.
Inflatables.monde_dinosaures_desc: Jump with the T-Rexes in this prehistoric playground.
Inflatables.jeux_interactifs_desc: Interactive games like human foosball, velcro wall, jousting, etc.
Inflatables.tente_reception_desc: A spacious and chic inflatable tent for your weddings, baptisms or corporate events.
Inflatables.arche_evenementielle_desc: Welcome your guests in style with this customizable inflatable arch.
Inflatables.ecran_projection_desc: Turn any space into an outdoor cinema. Ideal for movie nights or presentations.
Inflatables.mascotte_publicitaire_desc: A giant mascot in the image of your brand to attract attention at trade shows or marketing operations.
Inflatables.dome_marque_desc: For fairs, exhibitions, brand activation, and B2B events.
Inflatables.ecran_branding_desc: To broadcast marketing content in outdoor locations.
